snippet: Roderick A. Bradshaw went from being unemployed to attending a technology-based job-training program to juggling three part-time jobs and an internship.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, draws $142 to buy MetroCards for Roderick A Bradshaw so that he can attend classes at Per Scholas technology training program.
lead_paragraph: Roderick A. Bradshaw went from being unemployed to attending a technology-based job-training program to juggling three part-time jobs and an internship.

headline.main: In a Zigzag, He Finds a Path to Success
headline.print_headline: In a Zigzag, He Finds a Path to Success
